```py
data Box<T>:
  | box(ref v :: T)
end

fun unbox-now<T>(b :: Box<T>) -> T:
  b!v
end

fun set-box-now<T>(b :: Box<T>, new-v :: T) -> Box<T>:
  b!{v: new-v}
end
```

```py
check:
  n1 = box(1)
  n2 = box(2)
  set-box-now(n1, 3)
  set-box-now(n2, 4)
  unbox-now(n1) is 3
  unbox-now(n2) is 4
end
```

```py
check:
  b1 is-not%(identical) b2
  b1 is%(identical) b3
  b2 is-not%(identical) b3
end
```

```py
> > check:
> >   b1 is b3
> >   b1 is b2
> > end
> > ```

```py
check:
  unbox-now(b1) is-not unbox-now(b2)
  unbox-now(b1) is unbox-now(b3)
end
```

```py
check:
  b1 is%(equal-now) b2
  b2 is%(equal-now) b3
end
```

```py
check:
  equal-now(b1, b2) is true
  (b2 =~ b3) is true
end
```

```py
b1-id-b2 = unbox-now(b1) == unbox-now(b2)
b1-id-b3 = unbox-now(b1) == unbox-now(b3)
```
